about_the_game:
Temujin Corporation must be stopped!

Quantum Coherence is an upcoming narrative space action-adventure game with psychedelic twist, that takes place in the future of our universe. You are a spy who has infiltrated the evil Temujin corporation and must harvest Qiyou, the resource that powers space travel.

Use your spaceship & equipment to purify Qiyou into energy within the BLINC engine of your ship. With the power of this energy you can teleport to safety (with some degree of certainty) and may be able to restore all the planets destroyed by Temujin corporation and save the universe itself…

Explore philosophical concepts like panpsychism, consciousness, intelligence, and agency in this space action adventure game!

With its 3D space action adventure gameplay and deep exploration of some of humanity's most fundamental questions about itself, Quantum Coherence promises an immersive narrative and an exciting space combat experience.

The universe is about to collapse, and you're the only one who can stop it.
